mapper.sql: id, group_code, task_code, task_name, sort, days, day_flag, operators, minutes, score, remarks, status, user_id, user_name, create_time
mapper.select: select t.id,t.group_code,t.task_code,t.task_name,t.sort,t.days,t.day_flag,t.operators,t.minutes,t.score,t.remarks,t.`status`,t.user_id,t.user_name,t.create_time, t1.id_code,t1.code_name, t3.id operationTeamId, t4.member_user_id memberUserId,t4.memberUserName from bill_task t LEFT JOIN task_group t1 on t1.id_code = t.group_code AND t1.types=1 LEFT JOIN ocean_bill t2 on t2.task_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN operation_team t3 ON t3.id = t2.operation_team_id LEFT JOIN ( select t.id,t.task_type,t.task_id,t.operation_team_id,t.member_user_id,t.`status`,t.creator,t.creation_time, t1.task_code billTaskCode,t1.task_name billTaskName, t2.task_code waybillTaskCode,t2.task_name waybillTaskName, t3.group_code operationGroupCode,t3.group_name operationGroupName, t4.`name` memberUserName from task_member_relation t LEFT JOIN bill_task t1 on t1.id = t.task_id AND t.task_type = 1 LEFT JOIN waybill_task t2 on t2.id = t.task_id AND t.task_type = 2 LEFT JOIN operation_team t3 on t3.id = t.operation_team_id LEFT JOIN system_user t4 on t4.id = t.member_user_id ) t4 ON t4.task_id = t.id AND t4.billTaskCode = t.task_code AND t4.billTaskName = t.task_name AND t4.operation_team_id = t2.operation_team_id WHERE t2.id = #{obId} ORDER BY t.sort ASC
